title: pix_biquad
description: The `pix_biquad` object applies a time-based Infinite Impulse Response (IIR) filter to images, functioning similarly to the audio `biquad~` object but for visual data. It processes incoming images (`x(n)`) to produce filtered output images (`y(n)`) based on a set of six filter coefficients (fb0, fb1, fb2, ff1, ff2, ff3). Users can also reset the filter's internal buffers with a `set` message.
